name: The BUCKET of BLOOD
description:
It is a  2D shooter game in which u have to survive from the waves of Slimes.

Doors are locked u have to move forward, what will u do ?

SACRIFICE something such as ur HP , etc and fill the BUCKET of BLOOD.

CONTROLS:

Default and some specified in the game.

UPDATES :

Boss health bar and some tweaks.

I believe that Player  itself should explore the hidden stuffs rather than to follow a TUTORIAL.

PS: This is somewhat a complicated game so please spend some time before judging it. :D and i hope u will love it .

CREDITS :

Music Score from : http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/onlymeith/61318

Platform Assets : https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack

and they are awesome.

Thanks for reading. : )
